A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One of the worst movies I have seen related to star wars... How can they justify the main bad guy they had been building up one shoted and STILL since they killed all the build up? Or how Rey is STILL a mary sue and has not been improved on at all. She can still beat hardened fighters without proper training\, she can still fly ships despite being on a desert planets. Say what you like about Luke\, at least he got his ass kicked and showed he TRAINED. Disappointment\, from a long time fan.
